name: Nakoma Dragon Golf Course
description: Mountain golf at The Dragon near Graeagle—dramatic elevation changes and scenic Sierra views, ideal for golf groups and corporate outings.

faqs.question: What’s included in Nakoma Dragon golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at The Dragon, carts, and concierge planning. Optional transportation, dining, and multi-course itineraries.

faqs.question: How much do Nakoma Dragon packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $199–$449 per golfer depending on season, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time blocks, tournament setup, and logistics for corporate and leisure groups.

meta.title: Nakoma Dragon Golf Course | Graeagle Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Plan The Dragon at Nakoma near Graeagle with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.
